title: Magnificent Twisted Fate/Old Legendary skins vs Firefighter Tristana VFX
body:
A few years ago, the question was raised about updating old Legendary skins such as Magnificent Fate, Red Baron Corki, Annie in Wonderland etc etc. However this was shutdown in discussion with Morello.

Now I'm not gonna complain about the updated VFX for Firefight Tristana, but what about the other legendary skins, shouldn't they get some love too?

replies.body:
if the champ is getting updated then ofc, but otherwise, no. its pointless to update skins people cant buy.

the trist one is not only a legendary, but also legacy. and would look REALLY different to the new model and possibly wouldnt even interact correctly with the animations overall.

if TF gets updated then magnificent might get updated too...
TF already got updated in the past
yeah i think they need to do a wide sweep of updated legacy skins, i have unmasked kayle which should be much cooler than what it is
